name: Daniel Boone Community Action Agency
description: Community Action Agency serving Clay, Jackson, Laurel, Lee, Owsley, and Wolfe counties in Kentucky. Provides comprehensive social, employment, human, and health services to empower individuals and families toward self-sufficiency. Programs include housing assistance, LIHEAP energy assistance, child care, transportation, emergency services, and community development. Mission is to improve living conditions and guide families toward self-sufficiency through community collaboration.
source: Verified from official website and multiple online sources
eligibility: Low-income individuals and families in Clay, Jackson, Laurel, Lee, Owsley, and Wolfe counties
notes: One of Kentucky's Community Action Agencies. Serves 6 counties with multiple office locations. Main office in Manchester, KY (Clay County) at 1535 Shamrock Road. Also has offices in Jackson County (McKee), Rockcastle County (Mt. Vernon), Lee County (Beattyville), Owsley County (Booneville), and Wolfe County (Campton). Provides LIHEAP appointments and various community programs.
